en.title: Full Stack Developer
en.subtitle: I'm Luka üëã
en.about-text: I design and develop end-to-end web applications with a personalized approach to create technical solutions that meet the specific needs of clients. I work with the latest technologies, collaborate in teams, and always strive to exceed expectations.

experience-list.title: Freelance Developer
experience-list.description: Web application development. Customized technological solutions according to client needs.

experience-list.title: Full Stack Developer
experience-list.description: Designed and developed end-to-end web applications, covering both frontend and backend, with a personalized approach to meet specific client needs. Effectively collaborated in multidisciplinary development teams, participating in strategic meetings with clients to understand and fulfill their requirements.

experience-list.title: JavaScript, React, Node.js, Web Development Tutor
experience-list.description: As a full-stack development tutor at Coderhouse, I led students in both frontend and backend aspects. I customized teaching, guided their practical projects, and participated in pedagogical meetings to adapt to students' needs, also serving as a substitute teacher.

experience-list.description: Taught full-stack web development at Global Academy, covering programming fundamentals, interface design, web application development, SEO optimization, and database management. Provided guidance and technical support to students, resolving queries and assisting them in completing their projects. It was a rewarding experience to share my knowledge and witness students' growth in the technology field.
